Translations.Text: Alo. Tazmamt, Nessers ak p id, iwakken a ppessuff$ev imdanen si tillas ar tafat, s wannuf n Mass nnsen, s abrid n Wuzmir, Amaazuz
Oebbi ilan i illan deg igenwan, i illan di tmurt. A ssxev ijehliyen, ilmend uaaqeb uqsie
i ismenyafen tameddurt n ddunit wala laxeot, i iswexxioen seg ubrid n Oebbi, u ssaramen t d uawij! Widak, atnan di ttelfan u$miq
Ur d Nuzen amazan, siwa s tmeslayt n ugdud is, iwakken ad asen ibeggen. Oebbi Itellif win i S ihwan, Inehhu win i S ihwan. Neppa d Uzmir, d Bab n uuwab
Ih, ni$ Nuzen ed Musa, s issekniyen nne£: "ssuffe$ agdud ik, si tillas ar tafat. Mmekti yas d ussan n Oebbi". Deg waya, war ccekk, d issekniyen i yal aueboi isnemmiren

Mi inna Musa i ugdud is: "mmektit ed l$it ikwen I$at Oebbi, mi kwen Isellek si lois n Feraun, i issuken fellawen lhemm uqsie. Zellun arrac nnwen, ssidiren tilawin nnwen. Deg waya, s$uo Mass nnwen, d cedda tameqwoaeant
Mi d Inna Mass nnwen: "ma tesnemmrem, ih, ad awen Rnu$. Ma tjehlem, aaaqeb iW, war ccekk, ad iwaao
Inna Musa: "ma tjehlem, kunwi akked wid n tmurt meooa, ihi, Oebbi d Asaay, d Amaazuz

Day ur kwen id ibbwiv ara usali imezwura nnwen: agdud n Nue, Aad, Tamud, akked wid iten ivefoen? Ur ten issin yiwen, siwa Oebbi. Usan ten id imazanen nnsen, s ubeggen. Rran ifassen nnsen s imawen nnsen, nnan: "S tidep, nejhel ayen i$ef d teppuceggaam. Ih, nekwni di ccekk imcebbwel, $ef wayen u$uo la $ tneccdem

Nnan imazanen nnsen: "day illa ccekk di Oebbi, Axellaq n tmurt akked igenwan? Inecced ikwen id, iwakken ad awen Isemmee kra ibekkaven nnwen, a kwen Ioo ar lajel ipwassnen". Nnan: "kunwi, s tidep, d imdanen kan, am nekwni. Teb$am ad a$ tesiixxoem, seg wayen llan aabden imezwura nne$. Awit a$ d adabu n uuee

Nnan asen imazanen nnsen: "nekwni d imdanen kan, am kunwi, maca Oebbi Iteg ccan i win i S ihwan, deg imdanen iS. Ur a$ ippunefk ara ad awen d nawi adabu, siwa s wannuf n Oebbi. £ef Oebbi ara ppeklen lmumnin
Acu i $ iu$en, ur nepkal ara $ef Oebbi? Ni$ Imla ya$ iberdan nne$; neubeo, war ccekk, i lmerta i tesaaddam fella$. £ef Oebbi ara ppeklen, at letkal
Nnan wid ijehlen i imazanen nnsen: "war ccekk, a kwen nessuffe$ si tmurt nne$, ne$ a d tu$alem ar ddin nne$". Iweeea yasen d Mass nnsen: "s tidep, a Nesqucc imednas
d$a, war ccekk, a kwen Nerr d imezda$ n tmurt, deffir sen". Ayagi, i win ippagwaden tilin iW, ippagwaden aberri W
Ssarmen l$elb. Ixseo yal aqehhao amnafeq
Loahennama deffir es, ad ites aman iwexmiyen
Tissit d tije$wimin, ur izmir ad isseblaa. Tameppant a d teppas si yal tamnai, neppa ur ipmeppat. Deffir es aaaqeb uqsie
Amedya n wid ijehlen, ar Mass nnsen: igiten nnsen am i$i$den i$ef iedem wavu, ass n tbucivant. Ur d ppawin acemma, seg wayen kesben. D wagi ay d ttelfan u$miq
Day ur twalav ara, Oebbi Ixleq tamurt akked igenwan, s tidep? Ma ihwa yaS, a kwen Ikkes, a d Iawi lxelq amaynut
Ayagi, i Oebbi, ur illi d ayen izzenzafen

A d rsen akw zdat Oebbi. Ad inin uohifen i imzuxiyen: "s tidep, nella nedda yidwen, ma tzemrem ad a$ tsellkem kra, seg uaaqeb n Oebbi"? A d inin: "lemmer i $ Inha Oebbi, yili nwelleh ikwen. Iauva fella$, neemeq ne$ neubeo, ur a$ illi ssoan

Mi isuyya lameo, a d yini Cciian: "Oebbi, d uuee, Iweaad awen lemaahda n tidep. Weaade$ awen, $uoe$ kwen. Ur sai$ adabu fellawen, siwa anecced nnwen. Tu$em awal iw. Ur iyi plummut, lummet iman nnwen. Ur zmire$ a kwen aawne$, ur tezmirem ad iyi taawnem. Nekoe$ wid iyi tepcarakem, zik. I imednas, s tidep, aaaqeb aqeoean
Ad skecmen wid iumnen, ixeddmen ayen ilhan, ar leonanat, ddawat sen isaffen ppazzalen, ad wekkoen dinna, s wannuf n Mass nnsen. Azul nnsen dinna d: "tifrat
Day ur twalav ara, amek id Ifka Oebbi amedya? Awal laali am ttejoa laali, ieuoan is ouan, iferkawen is di tegnewt
Teppak ed lfakia s, di yal imir, s wannuf n Mass is. Ippawi d Oebbi imedyaten i imdanen, amar a d mmektin
Amedya n wawal ucmit, am ttejoa tucmip, teqlaa sennig wakal, war leqoao
Oebbi Itebbit wid iumnen s wawal utebbet, di tmeddurt n ddunit akked laxeot. Oebbi Itellif imednas. Oebbi Ixeddem ayen i S ihwan
Day ur twalav ara wid ineufen l$it n Oebbi, s tijehli? Ssersen agdud nnsen deg uxxam n twa$it
Loahennama ad o$en degs: a yir leqoao
Gan aS i Oebbi tanudda, iwakken ad telfen seg ubrid iS. Ini: "zzhut! S tidep, leqoao nnwen d times
Ini i imdanen iW iumnen, ad bedden i teallit, ad seddqen seg wayen iten N$at, s tuffra u ainani, uqbel a d ias wass ideg ur illi ssuq, ur telli tdukli
Oebbi i Ixelqen tamurt akked igenwan, id Isse$layen aman seg igenni, Issufu$ ed yissen ppemoa, d ooeeq i kunwi. Inub fellawen s isaffen, u s lbabuo i iteddun di yill, s lameo iS
Inub fellawen s yiiij d waggur, d imezgiyen. Inub fellawen s yiv akked wass
Ifka yawen seg wayen akw i S tessutrem. Ma peesbem l$it n Mass nnwen, ur tessawavem. Ih, amdan, s tidep, d amednus, d ajehli
Mi inna Iboahim: "a Mass iw! Err tamdint agi d tin n laman, Aatq a$, nek d warraw iw, seg wannuz n taancuoin
A Mass iw, nitenti, s tidep, telfent aias n medden. Win iddan yidi, neppa, s tidep, sgi. Win iyi auuan, Kecc, s tidep, Tepsemmieev, Tepeunuv

A Mass nne$! Nek rri$ tanezdu$t, i kra n warraw iw, di te$zut ibuoen, ar Uxxam iK ioqan. A Mass nne$! Iwakken ad bedden i teallit. Err ulawen n kra n medden, ad ieninen $uosen, £it iten s ppemoat, amar ad snemmren
A Mass nne$! Kecc, s tidep, Teeoiv ayen neffer akked wayen nenna. Ur iffir wacemma i Oebbi, di tmurt ne$ deg igenni
Ccekoan i Oebbi iyi d Ifkan, di tewser iw, Ismaail akked Iseaq. Mass iw, s tidep, Issemeas i tnaaoit
A Mass iw, Err iyi ad bedde$ i teallit. Akked kra, si tarwa w. A Mass iw, Steoeeb s unuju w
A Mass nne$! Semmee ane$, nek d lwaldin iw, akked lmumnin, ass ideg ara d ias uqeiii
Ur p$ili ar I$fel Oebbi, $ef wayen xeddmen imednas. Iooa ten kan, ar ass ideg ara beeeren allen
Ad p$awalen, iqweooa ff$en d, allen ur ferzent, ulawen d ilmawen

Nabi imdanen af wass ideg ara ten id yas uaaqeb. Ad inin wid idensen: "a Mass nne$! Efk ane$ lmudda wezzilen, a d njaweb i unabi K, a neddu d imazanen". "Day ur teggulem ara kunwi, zik, ar ur tep$abem
Tzed$em ixxamen n wid ivuooen iman nnsen. U Nbeggen awen d amek i sen Nga, u Nefka yawen d imedyaten
Ni$ undin ccbukat nnsen. Ccbukat nnsen haatent ar Oebbi, xas ma ccbukat nnsen d tid ara isse$lin idurar
£uoek a p$ilev Oebbi ad Izgel lemaahda S, i imazanen. S tidep, Oebbi d Uzmir, Ippara d ppao
Ass ideg tamurt a ppu$al macci d tamurt; akken igenwan; a d asen ar Oebbi Yiwen, Aqehhao
A pwaliv, assen, ibe$wviyen pwaqqnen wa $er wa
Lebsa nnsen d qevoan, times t$umm udmawen nnsen
Iwakken ad Ikafi Oebbi yal amdan, $ef wayen ikseb. Oebbi, s tidep, Ip$awal di leesab
Wagi d anecced i imdanen, ad pwanedoen yis, ad eoen ar siwa Neppa ay d Oebbi Yiwen, a d mmektin uaqilen
